name: All-Soap's Miraculous Dye Remover
flavorText: The miraculous, mystical tonic that removes stains, cures rotfoot and tastes great! It's got what plants crave!Warning: Do Not Drink.
flavorTextHtml:
The miraculous, mystical tonic that removes stains, cures rotfoot and tastes great! It's got what plants crave!

Warning: Do Not Drink.
description: Returns a single piece of armor to its original color.
descriptionHtml: Returns a single piece of armor to its original color.
